data.message: Been a fan for more years than i can remember, the bush hatred and antics i was with you, your lyrics have had many ways of getting me through life... i stood behind you and bought every cd even though i could have gotten them leaked but i paid for them! I even almost understood you had to be a Democrat and hold onto where your from otherwise it was career suicide but  Listening to the new cypher has me withdrawn... you talk about vegas gun reform for what? U carry pistols illegally everday? U talk for the black players for using the nfl as a stage? Want to make a difference use the communities as a stage, i dont watch any award shows anymore because of this.... i almost said we have our differences but im still an EM supporter.... till you drew your line in the sand like a kid... nuculear north korea doesnt bother you but trump does? On this im done... now i wish you would have overdosed and saved us all the pain of you turning your back on the biggest fans

replies.message: Bethany Lynn Avitia and another one 😂😂
Amen!! Couldn’t have said it better. 🇺🇸

no no no!! please dont leave! oh wait who gives a fuck...

keep your 20 bucks! M from now on ill buy two albums to make up for this dudes loss... ha ha ha...
"drawing a line in the sand like a kid" bothers you so badly, is sooo horrible...wishing someone you used to love had overdosed is your response? Seriously, dude. That's messed up.
Wow wishing death on somebody (even a stranger) is just asking Karma to knock on your door. Never speak words that you can't live with. I will never say "Fuck off and die." again.

Pretty much why he draws the line though isn't it? Those people supporting a man who is causing damage to many others. Yet because it personally has little affect on you, I'm sure you don't give a damn.
I hope trump fucks the world up! Finally a president with balls! Peace bitches
Freedom of speech. Dont like it move to Korea
